entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who is being discussed by Mr. Weasley and Tonks. He is described as someone that Fudge is frightened of.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as the Minister of Magic who is frightened of Dumbledore. He thinks Dumbledore is plotting to overthrow him.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as someone who is discussing Dumbledore with Harry and Tonks.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as someone who is discussing Dumbledore with Mr. Weasley and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who is incredulous about Fudge being frightened of Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Fudge is frightened of Dumbledore, thinking he is plotting to overthrow him.
Dumbledore wants to be the Minister of Magic, although he has never applied for the job.
